amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: \ TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to pay any United States contribution to the United Nations or any affiliated agency of the United Nations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to pay any United States contribution to the United Nations or any affiliated agency of the United Nations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 335 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Paul.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
